name: Princess Isabella: Return of the Curse
name_original: Princess Isabella: Return of the Curse
description: A year later everyone thought they had seen the last of the witch but she's back! This time she's captured Princess Isabella's child and cast a spell over the whole kingdom in the process. Save the kingdom and follow the witch's evil path back to her lair. Defeat her for the last time with the help of your trusty Fairy sidekick and a new friend you met along the way in Princess Isabella: Return of the Curse!
